messages.about_mission.download.text: Get the free app and sell the clothes you just don’t wear anymore. For your price, with 0% selling fees.
messages.about_mission.download.title: Declutter your closet today
messages.about_mission.facts.beginning.text: In 2008, Milda was moving house, but had too many clothes to take with her. Justas offered help and built a website to give away her clothes to friends. Soon enough, the media wanted in, too. The duo knew they were on to something - Vinted was born.
messages.about_mission.facts.beginning.title: From 2 people
messages.about_mission.facts.mission.text: Sell what you don’t wear or hunt for rare finds - the world of pre-loved has long moved out of thrift stores. Our growing community of 21 million is on a mission to make second-hand the first choice.
messages.about_mission.facts.mission.title: On a global mission
messages.about_mission.facts.team.text: Today, 150 people work at Vinted to help the world sell, buy and swap second-hand wardrobe items. Our team spans countries and cultural backgrounds, just like our members do.
messages.about_mission.facts.team.title: To a team of 150
messages.about_mission.facts.title: 1 simple idea now unites a community of 21 million
messages.about_mission.facts.working.text: Vinted’s central offices are based in Berlin and Vilnius. These two spots help us we operate in 9 markets: USA, France, Germany, UK, Poland, Czech Republic, Lithuania, Spain and the Netherlands.
messages.about_mission.facts.working.title: Working across Europe
messages.about_mission.leadership.ceo.subtitle: Thomas
messages.about_mission.leadership.ceo.title: CEO
messages.about_mission.leadership.coo.subtitle: Mantas
messages.about_mission.leadership.coo.title: COO
messages.about_mission.leadership.founders.title: Founders
messages.about_mission.leadership.subtitle: Investors
messages.about_mission.leadership.text: In everything we do, we’re still true to Vinted’s initial idea, developed by our cofounders Milda and Justas. Today, Vinted’s CEO Thomas and COO Mantas lead the company’s daily operations and growth. Our mission is also backed by 3 leading venture capital firms from both sides of the Atlantic.
messages.about_mission.leadership.title: Investors & Leadership
messages.about_mission.motivation.text: We want to show you just how brilliant second-hand can be. Sell the clothes that have more to give. Shop for items you won’t find on the high street. Vinted is open to everyone who believes that good clothes should live long.
messages.about_mission.motivation.title: Don’t wear it? Sell it!

messages.activate_balance.fields.personal_id_numb: We don’t store this information. Your Social Security number (SSN) is only required by our payment service provider for identity verification purposes.
messages.activate_balance.fields.ssn.note: We won't store your Social Security number. It's just needed to verify your identity and ensure successful payouts.
messages.activate_balance.fields.ssn.title: Social Security number (last 4 digits)
messages.activate_balance.privacy: El saldo Vinted está gestionado por Mangopay SA, nuestro proveedor de servicios de pago regulado (PSP). Al activar tu saldo Vinted, confirmas los términos del PSP y aceptas que tus datos le sean transferidos. Al activar tu saldo Vinted, podrás estar sujeto a los controles de verificación de la identidad (KYC) realizados por el PSP. Para obtener más información, visita nuestro Centro de Asistencia.
